org.concordion.ext

Class LoggingTooltipExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.concordion.ext.LoggingTooltipExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.concordion.api.extension.ConcordionExtension

    public class LoggingTooltipExtension
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.concordion.api.extension.ConcordionExtension
    Annotates the Concordion HTML output with logging information captured using a LogMessenger.

    Default Configuration

    By default, this extension will capture all output from the root logger and disable console logging of the root logger.

    Custom Configuration

    The extension can be customised using the custom constructor. The logging can be restricted to named loggers, and by logging levels. The output of logging to the console can also be enabled.

    Custom Log Framework

    An alternate LogMessenger implementation can be provided. The default uses java.util.logging.

    Thanks to Trent Richardson for the CSS Tooltip implementation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoggingTooltipExtension()
      Default constructor that logs output from all java.util.loggers, with a Level of INFO or higher, and disables the console output of the root logger.
      LoggingTooltipExtension(LogMessenger messenger)
      Implementation that permits a custom LogMessenger.
      LoggingTooltipExtension(java.lang.String loggerNames, java.util.logging.Level loggingLevel, boolean displayRootConsoleLogging)
      Custom constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoggingTooltipExtension

        public LoggingTooltipExtension()
        Default constructor that logs output from all java.util.loggers, with a Level of INFO or higher, and disables the console output of the root logger.

      • LoggingTooltipExtension

        public LoggingTooltipExtension(LogMessenger messenger)
        Implementation that permits a custom LogMessenger.
        Parameters:
        messenger -

      • LoggingTooltipExtension

        public LoggingTooltipExtension(java.lang.String loggerNames,
                       java.util.logging.Level loggingLevel,
                       boolean displayRootConsoleLogging)
        Custom constructor. Uses a JavaUtilLogMessenger logger.
        Parameters:
        loggerNames - a comma separated list of the names of loggers whose output is to be shown in the Concordion output. An empty string indicates the root logger.
        loggingLevel - the logging Level for the handler that writes to the Concordion output. Log messages of this level and higher will be output. Note that the associated Loggers must also have an appropriate logging level set.
        displayRootConsoleLogging - false to remove console output for the root logger, true to show the console output
